extracted_playbook.condition: Which Mendix Runtime version is in use?

extracted_playbook.title: Monitor for Updates for Mendix Runtime V8
extracted_playbook.description: Currently, no fix is available for Mendix Runtime V8. Monitor for updates and apply them when available.

extracted_playbook.title: Update Mendix Runtime V9
extracted_playbook.description: Update Mendix Runtime V9 to version 9.24.26 or later to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Update Mendix Runtime V10
extracted_playbook.description: Update Mendix Runtime V10 to version 10.14.0 or later to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Update Mendix Runtime V10.6
extracted_playbook.description: Update Mendix Runtime V10.6 to version 10.6.12 or later to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Update Mendix Runtime V10.12
extracted_playbook.description: Update Mendix Runtime V10.12 to version 10.12.2 or later to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Alternative Authentication
extracted_playbook.description: Do not use basic authentication. Set up an alternative authentication module such as SAML, MendixSSO, or your own Identity Provider (IDP).

extracted_playbook.title: Protect Network Access
extracted_playbook.description: Protect network access to devices with appropriate mechanisms and configure the environment according to Siemens' operational guidelines for industrial security.

extracted_playbook.title: Minimize Network Exposure
extracted_playbook.description: Minimize network exposure for all control system devices and/or systems, ensuring they are not accessible from the internet. Locate control system networks and remote devices behind firewalls and isolate them from business networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Secure Remote Access Methods
extracted_playbook.description: When remote access is required, use secure methods such as Virtual Private Networks (VPNs), ensuring they are updated to the most current version available.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Perform proper impact analysis and risk assessment prior to deploying defensive measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Suspected Malicious Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Follow established internal procedures to report suspected malicious activity to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.
